mapper.sql: PATIENT_ID, VISIT_ID, DIAGNOSIS_TYPE, DIAGNOSIS_NO, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, CODE_NO, INSURANCE_ICD10_CODE, INSURANCE_ICD10_CODE_PLUS, SH_ICD10_CODE, SH_ICD10_CODE_PLUS, CLINIC_ICD10_CODE, CLINIC_ICD10_CODE_PLUS, ICD10_CODE, ICD10_CODE_PLUS
mapper.select: SELECT T.PATIENT_ID, T.VISIT_ID, T.DIAGNOSIS_NO, T.DIAGNOSIS_DESC, T.TREAT_RESULT, M.DIAGNOSIS_TYPE, M.DIAGNOSIS_CODE FROM MEDREC.FINAL_CHIEF_DIAGNOSIS T LEFT JOIN MEDREC.DIAGNOSTIC_CATEGORY M ON T.PATIENT_ID = M.PATIENT_ID AND T.VISIT_ID = M.VISIT_ID WHERE T.PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.TREAT_RESULT = '死亡' AND M.DIAGNOSIS_TYPE ='3';
mapper.insert: insert into DIAGNOSTIC_CATEGORY (PATIENT_ID, VISIT_ID, DIAGNOSIS_TYPE, DIAGNOSIS_NO, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, CODE_NO, INSURANCE_ICD10_CODE, INSURANCE_ICD10_CODE_PLUS, SH_ICD10_CODE, SH_ICD10_CODE_PLUS, CLINIC_ICD10_CODE, CLINIC_ICD10_CODE_PLUS, ICD10_CODE, ICD10_CODE_PLUS ) values (#{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{diagnosisType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{diagnosisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{insuranceIcd10Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceIcd10CodePlus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shIcd10Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shIcd10CodePlus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clinicIcd10Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clinicIcd10CodePlus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icd10Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icd10CodePlus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into DIAGNOSTIC_CATEGORY
PATIENT_ID,
VISIT_ID,
DIAGNOSIS_TYPE,
DIAGNOSIS_NO,
DIAGNOSIS_CODE,
CODE_NO,
INSURANCE_ICD10_CODE,
INSURANCE_ICD10_CODE_PLUS,
SH_ICD10_CODE,
SH_ICD10_CODE_PLUS,
CLINIC_ICD10_CODE,
CLINIC_ICD10_CODE_PLUS,
ICD10_CODE,
ICD10_CODE_PLUS,
